passives.name: Inner Flame
passives.effects:
Every 2 rounds, gain a random {{bi|Dragon Soul}}. Additionally, increase your total attack damage, ability power, attack speed, maximum health, armor, magic resistance, and ability haste by 4% for each {{bi|Dragon Soul}} you possess, up to 30% at maximum souls.

Once you have obtained all 6 {{bi|Dragon Soul|Dragon Souls}}, you also gain the {{bi|Aspect of the Dragon}} buff permanently at the next round interval. This buff counts as a soul for this effect, for a total stat increase of 35%.
